column5: Hi gang, haven't been around for the last 7 to 10 days, buzy with the catch of a life time. Almost 9 lb mommy, baby and daddy are all well. Be back on the board soon to catch up on some reading. Take care   Can you tell first time daddy.
Awesome news!! 9lbs!!!!!!  :o  :o  :o  :o        Does Mom still have feeling in her legs???   Gerritt.
Congrats...almost 9...mine were, 9.14 and 9.12, can you say a handful, never mind the mini diapers-pass go get the parachute.
Congrat's, (especially to the missus ), that's big news!

congrats on the beautiful new addittion to the family.  seems like only yesterday i was in your shoes, then i blinked and he's 2 years old and getting into everything.  there is nothing more fun in life.  jason
Congrats on a catch of a lifetime.

Congrats first time dad(and mom). I bet that was the most incredible day of your life. It's hard to explain to anyone without kids, but as soon as the baby is born you know what you are here for. The bond is instant and lasting and life will never be the same for you. It's a good thing. Treasure every second of it. It goes fast.
So how many is that??  What was going on last September?? Did I miss a memo or something LOL  Congrats single most important thing you can do.
